item.description: [[songs/c/counterparts/the_current_will_carry_us/pedestal.md#im-looking-back-on-those-i-once-looked-up-to-and-i-cant-help-vyl-wnanory|Mind strong, body strong.]] [[songs/c/counterparts/the_current_will_carry_us/pedestal.md#im-looking-back-on-those-i-once-looked-up-to-and-i-cant-help-vyl-wnanory|Try to find equilibrium.]] [[songs/c/counterparts/the_current_will_carry_us/pedestal.md#im-looking-back-on-those-i-once-looked-up-to-and-i-cant-help-vyl-wnanory|Head straight, screwed on.]] [[songs/c/counterparts/the_current_will_carry_us/pedestal.md#im-looking-back-on-those-i-once-looked-up-to-and-i-cant-help-vyl-wnanory|We screwed up, for too long.]] Â [[songs/s/sonic_youth/hits_are_for_squares/kool_thing.
